Articles.Content: I just got Avira to replace AVG... Since AVG was getting on my nerves. It says one of the viruses was detected in 04... The computer wasn\'t even built then... 90% of these are Worms. Time to stop going on suspicious sites.
sorry to say but lots of these antivirus programs make up loads to make you do stuff
Avira is pretty good, as this image shows.
What the heck kinds of sites are you guys browsing that you get thousands of viruses?

I think I just realised what that is.

Because it is also 273 pages long.

Its a listof viruses Avira has detected and can already defend against.

//Headdesk

Should have known since I searched earlier for how to bring that screen up, and Google said that Avira Virus Lab were the people that you send quarantined viruses to.
Why do you go on suspicious sites in the first place!?

Why do you go on suspicious sites in the first place!?

>Kerbalspaceprogram.com

>Twokinds.net/forum

>Madcomms.free-forums.org

>imgur.com

These are not suspicious sites. And yet they are the only ones I\'ve been on since a full virus scan came up negative this morning.
So Mr Virus, we meet again.

>Kerbalspaceprogram.com

>Twokinds.net/forum

>Madcomms.free-forums.org

>imgur.com

These are not suspicious sites. And yet they are the only ones I\'ve been on since a full virus scan came up negative this morning.

That means there\'s still something on your system downloading things in the background. You need to try some different tools I think.
imgur is the greatest site in existence.

There was a program in my Recycle Bin that was a virus.

So I trashed it.
Cheat Engine is considered a virus, and stuff can be wrongly accused (Without Trial!)

Cheat Engine is considered a virus, and stuff can be wrongly accused (Without Trial!)

That explains 10% of exploits.. Some of them can be from some of the programs I made. (They ask for access to the file system because I use them to backup KSP and MC.)
